Title: Hell Fest
Writer: Seth M. Sherwood (screenplay by), Blair Butler (screenplay by), William Penick (story by), Christopher Sey (story by), Stephen Susco (story by), Akela Cooper (screenplay by)
Actors: Cynthea Mercado, Stephen Conroy, Amy Forsyth, Bex Taylor-Klaus
Plot: A masked serial killer turns a horror-themed amusement park into his own personal playground, terrorizing a group of friends while the rest of the patrons believe that it is all part of the show.
